property.name: insertTargetQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.target ( target_id, target_name, diseases, products ) VALUES ( :TARGET_ID, :TARGET_NAME, :DISEASES, :PRODUCTS )

property.name: updateTargetQuery
property.value: UPDATE catgenome.target SET target_name = :TARGET_NAME, diseases = :DISEASES, products = :PRODUCTS WHERE target_id = :TARGET_ID

property.name: loadAllTargetsQuery
property.value: SELECT target_id, target_name, diseases, products FROM catgenome.target

property.name: loadTargetQuery
property.value: SELECT t.target_id, t.target_name, t.diseases, t.products, g.target_gene_id, g.gene_id, g.gene_name, g.tax_id, g.species_name, g.priority FROM catgenome.target t left join catgenome.target_gene g on t.target_id = g.target_id WHERE t.target_id = ?

property.name: loadTargetsQuery
property.value: SELECT distinct t.target_id, t.target_name, t.diseases, t.products FROM catgenome.target t left join catgenome.target_gene g on t.target_id = g.target_id

property.name: totalCountQuery
property.value: SELECT count(distinct t.target_id) FROM catgenome.target t left join catgenome.target_gene g on t.target_id = g.target_id
